title: Just a casual one hour queue timer.
body:
So I have waited over an hour for a game of league of legends on a new account. Is there currently a bug or is game dead? 
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/263122796962381826/459021356579684352/unknown.png

Update: Re-queued after and got another one hour timer...
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/436905905661935617/459036952620957696/unknown.png

replies.body: So, I'm confident to say this is *either* a bug, in which case you should submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (maybe submit one anyway), who *may* be able to help troubleshoot the issue (note: they may ask if you've re-logged from the client, restarted your computer, checked your internet connection and performed a client repair, basically the "have you turned it off and on again" kind of stuff) or it would be because there are few players getting involved with Normal Draft on pre-30 accounts, which kind of makes sense given the minimum 20 champions required, and the "unique" style, of the mode. You may want to try another queue and see if you get the same results, perhaps even stick with a different mode for the time being (I know it sucks, but it can't really be helped if it's a pre-30 queue-specific population issue).
